description: Make these easy and delicious crumble-topped berry muffins with the kids over the weekend or school holidays. Plus, they're a nutritionally approved snack that the kids will love.
name: Healthier Crumble-Topped Berry Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Grease a 12-hole ( 1/3 cup-capacity) muffin tray. Whisk apple puree, egg, vanilla, oil, maple syrup and milk in a large bowl until combined.
Combine flour, oats, cinnamon and nutmeg in a separate bowl. Make a well at the centre.
Add the milk mixture to the flour mixture, then stir until just combined. Fold through berries.

To make the crumble topping, combine oats and cinnamon in a small bowl. Spoon berry mixture equally among prepared holes of muffin tray. Sprinkle with crumble topping. Bake for 20 minutes or until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean.
